Author: tesu
Name: Penny Pincher
Punchline: Copies 1 below the cheapest offer to your clipboard when you check marketboard prices
Description:
Plugin for simplifying "pennying" (undercutting current lowest offer by 1).

The usual workflow for this is the following:
1. Open up the adjust price menu for the item you're undercutting
2. Click on the compare prices menu to view the current listings
3. Take a mental note of what the current lowest offer is
4. Subtract one from it
5. Close the current listings window
6. Update your item's price with the number you noted
7. Confirm your new price

This plugin eliminates the mental notekeeping steps in the middle by automatically copying the number you want onto your clipboard when you open the current listings window.  

Therefore, your new workflow becomes this:
1. Open up the adjust price menu for the item you're undercutting
2. Click on the compare prices menu to view the current listings
3. Close the current listings window
4. Paste the undercut value in
5. Confirm your new price

This both speeds up the process and reduces room for error from typos.
Changelog: updates config options for the new behavior (automatically undercutting HQ when listing HQ, don't undercut own retainer)

Author: Infi
Name: Death Roll Helper
Punchline: Plugin to help with a number of /random and /dice related games.
Description:
Plugin to help with several /random and /dice-related games.

Venue:
    + Concise display of all concurrent players in a list-based format
    + Supports multiple sorting types (min, max, nearest to) 
    + Highlight numbers based on regex matching 
DeathRoll:
    + Supports multiple players
    + Automatic checks to prevent number skipping
Tournament (1v1 DeathRoll):
    + Automatic bracket generation with byes to fill uneven
    + Forfeit functionality if a player needs to leave
Blackjack:
    + Automatic reward calculation based on common rules
    + Simplistic, or visual view of cards in play
    + Automatic or manual player-based draw for cards
    + Current players can be seamlessly moved to subsequent rounds
    + Configurable dealer rules (like Soft16)

Extra Features:
    + Block or prevent players from partaking in any game
    + Accept only /random or /dice commands

More features are planned, following user feedback.
Changelog:
[Blackjack]
+ Split Hand now acts like a real hand
+ Some cleanup

Description: Check where you can obtain a material from monsters, duties, crafting, gathering or where they can be bought from NPCs.

- Fixed data processing of wiki information
- Added aetherial reduction source

Author: Cair
Name: Redirect
Punchline: Change where your actions are going, queue macros, queue sprint, and queue potions!
Description: Easily change the targeting priority for spells and abilities. Queue macros, sprint, and potions! Type /redirect to configure.
Changelog: Update for FFXIV 6.3 (thank you, @ellieglad)

Author: fmauNeko
Name: Market board
Punchline: Browse the market board from anywhere.
Description: Browse the market board. /pmb to open.
Changelog:
- Added Advanced class filter
- Minimum quantity in Advanced Search
- Shopping list fixes: Correct world attribution + History total price fix
- Made compatible with API 8 / .NET 7

Author: Drahsid
Name: Better Shadows
Punchline: Take control of your shadows!
Description: Directly adjust the distance of each shadow cascade! Now introducing 4k shadowmap!
Changelog:
1.1.4
- Version should no longer be bogus
- Performance improvements

Author: karashiiro
Name: TextToTalk
Punchline: Chat and game dialogue TTS plugin.
Description: Chat and game dialogue TTS. Use /tttconfig to configure the enabled channels and triggers/exceptions.
Changelog: - Sends the speaker name in WebSocket messages

Author: Aireil
Name: FlyTextFilter
Punchline: Filter fly texts and pop-ups texts based on multiple criteria and allow the adjustment of their positions.
Description: Filter fly texts and pop-ups texts based on multiple criteria and allow the adjustment of their positions.

Author: Dragon
Name: Hunt Buddy
Punchline: Helps you track your daily hunt bills
Description: A daily hunt bill tracker

Author: d87
Name: BigPlayerDebuffs
Punchline: Larger personal debuffs
Description: Scales up buffs/debuffs applied by you on Target Status frames
Changelog: v1.1.0.8 - 6.3 Dalamud Update

Author: daemitus
Name: ezFauxHollows
Punchline: Highlights recommended tiles in Faux Hollows for your next move.
Description: This plugin highlights tiles in Faux Hollows that represent the best potential action you can take.

Author: Ottermandias
Name: GatherBuddy
Punchline: Simplify Gathering and Fishing.
Description:
Adds commands to simplify gathering by finding nodes and fish and their locations
via item name and a UI to keep track of special uptime and weather conditions.

Author: Caraxi
Name: Macro Chain
Punchline: Run multiple macros one after the other.
Description:
Allows for a macro to continue onto the next macro by using '/nextmacro' on the last line of a macro.
Adding '/nextmacro' on the last line of Macro #01 will automatically execute Macro #02
Adding '/nextmacro down' on the last line of Macro #01 will automatically execute Macro #11
Also allows executing any macro from chat using '/runmacro' but this command cannot be used while macros are running.

Author: daemitus
Name: ezWondrousTails
Punchline: Adds row probabilities to the Wondrous Tails display.
Description: This plugin prints the probability of getting a row in Wondrous Tails to the in-game display along with the average probability of what would happen if you shuffled.

Author: Infi, electr0sheep
Name: Eureka Linker
Punchline: Notify and Pop
Description:
Automatically notifies you about NMs in Eureka, with the ability to pop them on a tracker.
Other Features:
- Fairy Finder
- Bunny Timer Window
- Bunny Coffer Helper
- Stats
- Quest Guide (clickable coords)
- - Localized (DE, FR, JA)
Changelog:
[New]
+ Added log window, a small window to help with your weekly log (/ellog)

Author: shdwp, Avaflow, squidmade
Name: Party Icons
Punchline: Replace names with job icons, raid role positions and more!
Description:
Adjusts player nameplates base on current content. For example you can display raid positions (that are assigned automatically by listening to the chat), job icons, or names with job icons.

Reverse-engineering effort achieved by authors of JobIcons: haplo, daemitus, Loskh, wozaiha, without them this plugin would not be possible!
Changelog:
- Added the following icons as priority icons:
  - Looking to Meld Materia
  - Looking for Party
  - Game Master
  - Game QA
  - Event Participant
- I plan to go through and just add all of the overworld player icons (with exceptions as needed) since that'd be easier than adding them gradually as requested.

Author: ascclemens
Name: Burnt Toast
Punchline: Hides toast notifications you don't want to see.
Description: Hides toast notifications you don't want to see.
Changelog: API 8

Author: kalilistic
Name: SillyChat
Punchline: Make chat more fun with translations like pirate and urianger.
Description:
Allows you to translate player and NPC chat messages/bubbles.
Supported languages include: Pirate, Urianger, Leet, Pig Latin, and Turkey.

Author: Speedas
Name: Emote log
Punchline: Track who used what emotes on you.
Description: Adds a window logging all emotes used on you, so you never miss a sneaky dote again.
Changelog: - Fixed a crash that can occur on login

Author: Vielle Janlenoux
Name: Snooper
Punchline: See chat messages from your current target in a separate window.
Description: Adds a /snooper command that shows a separate window that shows only messages from the player you're currently targeting. Useful for keeping track of different conversations during crowded RP events.
Changelog: * Updated for Dalamud 8.

Author: imaginary-png
Name: Hunt Helper
Punchline: basically a hunt radar + train recorder + notifications + s rank utils +++.
Description: Hunt map with spawns points, A-Rank train recorder (w/ export/import sharing), TTS, Chat notifications, Counters for S-Rank Spawns

Author: Meoiswa
Name: Tilted
Punchline: Tilt the camera, not yourself.
Description: Automatically adjusts the Third Person Camera Angle/Distance given certain conditions.
Changelog: 3.0.0 Fixed trigger wonkiness, migrated config to new version

Author: Kouzukii
Name: Which Patch Was That?
Punchline: Quickly check the patch an item was released in!
Description:
Whenever you mouseover an item, the tooltip will show you the patch the item was released in.
Never carry around old useless crafting materials again!
Changelog: Add support for mounts, minions and fashion accessories

Author: zhudotexe
Name: PaissaHouse
Punchline: Crowdsourced housing alerts and lottery tracking for all.
Description:
Looking for that perfect house? PaissaHouse lets you receive notifications when a new plot of land is up for sale on your home world.
View the list of all houses available on a world at https://paissadb.zhu.codes/!

Want to contribute? Check out the repository (globe icon below) for instructions.
Changelog: Updated for 6.3

Author: Infi
Name: Better Playtime
Punchline: Ever wanted detailed information on your playtime all the way down to the second?
Description:
Provides expanded functionality to seamlessly track total playtime.
      Use /btime once on each character to add them.

      - Supports multiple characters,
      - Customisable output formats such as hours or minutes
      - Automatic playtime tracking after character got registered
      - Simple window to see current session playtime
      - Server Info Bar integration
Changelog: [nofranz]

Author: Gotest
Name: Kingdom Hearts UI Bars
Punchline: HP bar, MP bar, EXP bar, oh my!
Description:
A plugin that makes Kingdom Hearts UI stuff, such as a health bar for the player.
If you have any questions, issues or suggestions, please post an issue in the github or ping me in the Discord!
Changelog: Updated for API 8

Author: UnknownX
Name: QoL Bar
Punchline: Customizable ImGui hotbars
Description:
A plugin designed to provide a simple, customizable and always available interface for chat commands
or other plugins to alleviate the need for using macros and hotbar space to achieve similar results.

The plugin should initially appear as a small box on the bottom center of the game window.

Author: RedMage1993
Name: Mimicry Helper
Punchline: Automatically mimic the role you're looking for.
Description: Use /mimic to open up the menu and click on the appropriate button to automatically mimic the role you're looking for.
Changelog: Rebuilt for 6.3

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: JustBackup
Punchline: Automatically backup your game and plugin configuration.
Description: This plugin automatically backups your game and plugin configurations upon game/plugin starting.

Author: ascclemens
Name: Chat 2
Punchline: Electric Boogaloo - ♪ A whole new chat, a new fantastic chat window ♪
Description:
Chat 2 is a complete rewrite of the in-game chat window as a plugin. It
supports:

- Unlimited tabs
- Tabs that always send to a certain channel
- More flexible filtering
- RGB channel colouring
- Completely variable font size
- Sidebar tabs
- Unread counts
- Screenshot mode (obfuscate names)
Changelog:
- Fix various links not working.
- Fix a crash.
- Fix the search for item in recipes button.

Author: Helios
Name: Adaptive Hud
Punchline: Switches your /hudlayout when your game switches from windowed to fullscreen.
Description:
Useful for ultrawide users, swapping from windowed/fullscreen will automatically switch your hudlayout.

/pah to configure
Changelog: API 8

Author: Infi
Name: Submarine Tracker
Punchline: Simple Submarine Tracker and Builder
Description:
Simple and Easy
+ Tracks current builds, routes and times
+ Loot overview for each FC 
+ Builder to improve your builds
+ Save and load builds
+ Optimized EXP calculator for the selected build
+ Unlockable exploration points are highlighted
+ Breakpoint support
+ Configurable notification for returning subs
+ + Helper with lots of useful information
+ Support for multiple FCs
Changelog:
[New]
+ New command to access the config menu (/sconf)

[Changes]
+ All commands act as toggle now

[Builder]
+ Improvements to load and save
+ Added 3 letter map identification 
+ Allow overwrite of existing save with CTRL

Author: Felys
Name: EnemyListDebuffs
Punchline: Because tracking your DoTs shouldn't be difficult.
Description: Displays your debuffs on the enemy list. Original implementation credit to aers.
Changelog: 6.2 Arraydata fixed

Author: X'pahtalo
Name: FFXIV2MQTT
Punchline: Send game info over MQTT
Description: Send data to an MQTT broker to do all sorts of things. Change your lights with a macro, turn on the heater when you use Overheat, or start playing Rules of Nature when you switch to Gunbreaker. Requires an MQTTv5 compatible broker.
Changelog: Patch 6.3 support.

Author: Zhyra
Name: Market Uploader
Punchline: Uploads market data to market.xivhub.org and other configurable aggregators.
Description: Uploads market data to market.xivhub.org and other configurable aggregators.
Changelog: Initial release.

Author: ascclemens
Name: Better Party Finder
Punchline: Use advanced Party Finder filter presets.
Description:
Filter the party finder better.

All vanilla filtering is available, plus:

- Create filter presets to easily switch between
- Whitelist/blacklist specific duties and categories
- Add character names to hide PFs from
- Remove PFs above maximum item level
- Filter on item level range
- Filter on multiple jobs and slots (ex. MCH + GNB available)
Changelog: API 7

Author: ocealot
Name: JobBars
Punchline: Extra job gauges
Description: Additional job gauges, party buff timers, mitigation trackers, and more. Icon by PAPACHIN

Author: ascclemens
Name: The Great Separator
Punchline: Add separators to various numbers.
Description:
Add separators to various numbers.

- Damage/healing numbers (not DoTs or other players' numbers)
- Party list HP
- Ability costs on hotbars
- Ability costs in tooltips
Changelog: API 7

Author: perchbird
Name: ResLogger2.Plugin
Punchline: A path logger with optional crowdsourcing functionality.
Description:
ResLogger2 allows you to log paths that the game loads in a fast and convenient
window, with multiple options including only logging unique paths, path filters,
and uploading found paths. Information on the crowdsourced paths is available
at https://rl2.perchbird.dev.
Open the UI with /reslog.

Author: Chivalrik
Name: GentleTouch
Punchline: Create vibration patterns for the controller and specify triggers to make it vibrate.
Description:
You need to configure patterns and triggers before it will work, 
open the configuration window to do that.  

For DualSense/Shock4 support, the controller needs to be connected wired (same as the game's)
and there can only be one of a type connected (e.g., only one DualSense, not two).

Currently supported triggers are:
- Cooldowns
- Near Aether Current
Changelog: - fix(DS/4): No more auto-repeat when holding Create/PSHome

Author: electr0sheep
Name: Item Vendor Location
Punchline: Shows you where to buy vendor items
Description: Adds a context menu option for items that will show you where to find items you can buy off a vendor
Changelog: - Fixed issue with Filter GC Results option

Author: ocealot
Name: EasyEyes
Punchline: Hide annoying or distracting VFXs
Description: A plugin which can hide any VFX. Icon by PAPACHIN

Author: goat
Name: Character Data Sync
Punchline: Sync your character data from your main character to all others
Description:
This plugin allows you to use your character data from your main character on all others.

In-game, use the configuration menu to choose your main character, the restart the game to start syncing!

Author: Meisterlala
Name: Neko Fans
Punchline: Frustrated in a dungeon? Look at a cute cat girl!
Description:
Shows you an image of a random neko character. Click on the image to view the next one.
You can choose different image sources, allowing you to look at Catboys, Waifus, Cats, Dogs and more.

Supported APIs:
Twitter, nekos.best, Nekos.life, Catboys, Dog CEO, The Cat API, Pic.re, Waifu.im, Waifu.pics and shibe.online

Warning: You might see naughty images
Changelog:
- .Net 7 Update (FFXIV 6.3)
- Added warning for when the Twitter API limit is reached

Author: attick
Name: Mouseover Action
Punchline: Mo' actions no problems
Description: This plugin lets you target friends or enemies like a macro, without the clunkiness of a macro. /pmoaction opens the configuration.
Changelog: 6.3 update

Author: apetih
Name: Logogram Helper
Punchline: Helper plugin for Eureka's Logos Actions.
Description: Shows amounts of possible combinations for Eureka's Logos Actions upon entering the Logos Manipulator.
Changelog: - Fixed recipe for Wisdom of the Fiendhunter.

Author: Liza Carvelli
Name: Title Roulette
Punchline: Pick titles you want in a title roulette.
Description: Allows you to pick any number of titles, setting a random one each time you use "/ptitle" or "/ptitle groupName".

Author: ascclemens
Name: Glamaholic
Punchline: Save and swap your glamour plates.
Description:
Create and save as many glamour plates as you want. Activate up to 15 of them
at once at the Glamour Dresser. Supports exporting and importing plates for
easy sharing.
Changelog: API 8

Author: Critical_Impact
Name: Allagan Tools
Punchline: Get organized in FFXIV, easily locate/show where to sort items, plan your crafting, and search for mobs, duties, airships, and submarines!
Description:
Allagan Tool's primary purpose is to keep track of items across your characters/retainers/free company. With it's filter system you'll never lose track of items or not know where they should be sorted.

While this is it's primary purpose, it has quite an exhaustive list of other features including:
	- Craft planning
	- Market board integration
	- Item highlighting in inventories when searching/sorting and picking ingredients for crafts
	- Item window that includes vendor and source information among other things
	- Duty/mob/airship/submarine windows that are fully searchable
	- A filtering system that lets you setup complex searches for specific items 
	- Tooltip integration that'll let you see where the items are on hover
Changelog:
Retainer Venture Column/Filter
Real Money Shop Column/Filter
Added a window for viewing ventures + window for individual ventures
Added a new search operator, having a single ! will show all items that are not empty
Gil is now right aligned for easier reading
Added more mob spawn data(thanks users for contributing)
Fixed a copy json to clipboard crash for craft lists
Added a Item ID column
Added a Source World column

Author: ascclemens
Name: Expanded Search Info
Punchline: Displays extra information pulled from search info when examining.
Description:
Displays extra information pulled from search info when examining.

Support for:
- Any plain text URL
- Pastebin.com
- carrd.co/crd.co
- F-List
- Refsheet

Simply examine someone with a search info containing pointers to one of
these locations and the plugin will display information automatically.

Icon: expand by Gregor Cresnar from the Noun Project
Changelog: .NET 7

Author: Franz
Name: ChatTyper
Punchline: This is still mostly a dev tool for debugging, but people like it?
Description: Prefixes all chatbox messages with their chat type number and name, if known.
Changelog: Net7 / API 8 update

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: XIV Instant Messenger
Punchline: A direct message manager made in fashion of WoW Instant Messenger.
Description:
Features:
- Opes a direct message window when you message someone or they message you
- Each window contains your DM chat with certain person
- Open and cycle through recent chats with a hotkey
- Execute emote commands on a player from their DM window without needing to manually target them
- Automatically record your chat log in an easy to read text file
- Fully customizable styles

Author: Det
Name: Target Furniture
Punchline: You can now select furnitures from the Housing Menu
Description:
Currently, the only possible way to select a housing item is to click the furniture itself, and this can be a problem if you have multiple items close to each other.

This plugin adds a new option in the Housing Menu that targets the furniture for you

Author: Caraxi
Name: Simple Tweaks Plugin
Punchline: This was supposed to be simple...
Description:
A collection of Quality of Life tweaks. Aiming to improve the experience without changing anything drastically.
All changes are toggleable, with everything disabled by default. Visit the Repo for a full list of tweaks. (Globe icon below)

Author: Xorus
Name: EngageTimer
Punchline: Complete combat countdown, pull timer and OBS overlay
Description:
Finally, display all the numbers when starting a countdown!
Comes with an accurate pull timer that starts when you or any of your party members enter combat.

Features :
- Big countdown that displays all the numbers
- Customizable big-number textures (default, yellow, WoW style or custom files)
- Display combat time in the Server Info Bar, and/or a floating window
- OBS browser-source compatible page with countdown and current combat duration

Why the OBS thing ? Well, it can be useful if you want a big stylized stopwatch in your recordings.
See repository for more info.

Feel free so send me feedback, bugs and potential improvements!
Changelog: - Fix decimals not being properly hidden with the display threshold option

Author: Caraxi
Name: Adventurer in Need
Punchline: Recieve a notification when a duty roulette is in need of a role.
Description: Recieve a notification when a duty roulette is in need of a role. /pbonus to setup

Author: goat
Name: Wotsit
Punchline: Find anything, go anywhere, in style.
Description:
Adds a convenient quick search akin to Spotlight that lets you open game windows, teleport, find wiki articles, and more.
Press Control + T to open the search window. This can be changed by searching for "Wotsit Settings".

Author: daemitus
Name: ezMiniCactpot
Punchline: Shows the next best move in Mini Cactpot.
Description: This plugin highlights tiles and lines in MiniCactpot that represent the best potential action you can take.

Author: Gotest
Name: Audible Character Status
Punchline: You like annoying low HP sounds? This is great for you!
Description:
Plays a sound for certain statuses of the player. Such as low HP or MP.
You will need to provide your own sound files.
Changelog: Updated for API 8, volume level setting provides a more consistant change.

Author: kalilistic
Name: Kapture
Punchline: Track your loot.
Description:
Kapture is a loot tracker to capture drops, obtained items, rolls, and more.
Use the roll monitor to see who you are waiting on to roll.

Author: BitsOfAByte
Name: GoodFriend
Punchline: Instant friend login & logout notifications in-game between GoodFriend users.
Description:
A client to communicate with any GoodFriend-Compatible API to send & receive notifications when your friends login and logout of the game (as long as they are using this plugin & are connected to the same instance).

Features:
- Privacy-focused in design, all data is completely anonymized before leaving your machine.
- Support for "friend codes" to only receive and send notifications with others who share the same code.
- Customizable login & logout messages
- Basic & Bearer authentication support
- Can show notifications in chat, as a toast, or as a pop-up
- & more.
Changelog: - Optimizations and improvements

Author: Haplo064, Khayle
Name: Chat Bubbles
Punchline: Enables in-game chat bubbles.
Description: Using native chat bubble display, see who is talking about what in a more natural fashion.
Changelog: Update for 6.3, added API 8 compatibility

Author: Chickenstew
Name: Stormtalons
Punchline: Gives the value of current targets health in Stormtalons from the dead game Wildstar.
Description: Gives the value of current targets health in Stormtalons from the dead game Wildstar.
Changelog: - Fixed decaying stormtalon bar counter

Author: Haplo064, maintained by Franz
Name: WOLdo
Punchline: Making it easier to know where you are.
Description: Movable text overlay of the current location name.
Changelog: Net7 / API 8 update. Consider migrating to WhereAmIAgain though.

Author: attickdoor
Name: Ability Ants
Punchline: Draw ants when things are off cooldown.
Description: For the WoW player who can't live without WeakAuras lighting up a button when it's off CD. /pants to configure.
Changelog: ants in your pants!

Author: WildWolf
Name: DeepDungeonDex
Punchline: Live monster data for Deep Dungeons.
Description:
A live bestiary for Deep Dungeon.
Shows target mob aggro type, a subjective threat level, status vulnerabilities, and a general overview of notable mechanics.
Threat level is meant to be taken with a grain of salt, is aimed towards solo players, and assumes a general familiarity with deep dungeon mechanics and the class being played.
Information is accurate to the best of my knowledge based on crowdsourced information, but I could use your help! Please open an issue on the GitHub if you'd like to correct inaccurate or untested data.
Original by Strati
Changelog:
### 2.5.5 (2023-04-18)


### Bug Fixes

* opacity not being set during load (a8ff4ba)

Author: Marconsou
Name: Deep Dungeon Tracker
Punchline: Track things inside Deep Dungeons (Solo only).
Description:
-Keep track of the number of kills, coffers opened, regeneration potions consumed, potsherds obtained, total time and more.
-Examine the collected data.
-Scoring.
Changelog: - Added the option [Improved Magicite Kills Detection], under General tab > Testing section.

Author: ocealot
Name: SkillSwap
Punchline: Skill mod creator
Description: Create animation replacement mods for Textools or Penumbra. Icon by PAPACHIN

Author: Kaminaris
Name: NextUIPlugin
Punchline: OverlayPlugin for Dalamud with built in HUD replacement
Description: OverlayPlugin replacement for Dalamud, works similarly to BrowserHost with addition to having more options and built in websocket server.
Changelog: Updated for patch 6.31h - fixed required version

Author: kalilistic
Name: Tippy
Punchline: Tippy, your new FFXIV virtual assistant.
Description:
Developed by goat for April Fools 2021 and unnecessarily resurrected by kal.

Handcrafted by our finest code artisans with special AI, 
he will analyze your playstyle to give you useful tips to get your GAMING to the next level.

Some things he can do:
* He can give general tips about the game
* He can give tips about the job you're playing
* He can report on your battle performance
* He will respect your feelings

Author: rekyuu
Name: Stanley Parable XIV
Punchline: Witty commentary to the brilliant things you do.
Description: Check /narrator for full options or use /narratorvolume to set volume manually.
Changelog:
- Fixed AFK events playing in cutscenes
- Fixed AFK events not playing again after playing once
- Fixed some PVP events causing a crash if a player goes missing
- Refactored duty events to only play in whitelisted content types
- Added a disk space check and feedback for new plugin users

Author: LittleNighmare
Name: Used Name
Punchline: A simple tool to record players' used names and nickname
Description: A simple tool to record players' used names and nickname, only supports SocialList currently. Right click on the target to add/check the used names and nickname.
Changelog:
- player not in FriendList of game could update
- Add a temporary subscription list to add non friends to the plugin's player list
- Remove Update from Player Search
- Add Update from Company Member
- Improve text quality

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: Weatherman
Punchline: Allows precise control over time and weather per zone or globally.

Author: Lore
Name: TooltipNotes
Punchline: A Plugin that lets you add notes to item Tooltips
Description: By Right-clicking an Item you can add a new note or edit an existing one
Changelog:
1.0.0.0
## Feature
Made Debug logging a optional toggle 

This version also removes access to the allnotes Window since it is very buggy and kinda useless in its current form.
It will come back in the next testin release, this is just to prepare for the port to stable.

Author: NotNite
Name: cl_showpos
Punchline: Customizable, Source Engine-styled position info
Description: Shows your exact position, rotation, and velocity on screen. Based off of the cl_showpos command from the Source Engine.

Author: Bluefissure
Name: MapLinker
Punchline: Record the maplinks in chat
Description: Automatically record the maplinks in chat and retrieval later.
Changelog: Patch 6.3 & API8 & net7

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: EnemyListHP (former EnmityHp)
Punchline: Displays enemies hp in enemy list.
Description: Displays enemies hp in enemy list. Just does that, nothing else.

Author: MidoriKami
Name: No Tank You
Punchline: Warns you when yourself or others are missing role-specific actions
Description:
Displays warnings when you or any party members are missing role specific actions such as partner buffs, pets, and tank stances.

/nty help → Display all available commands

Author: Ottermandias
Name: RezPls
Punchline: Highlighting of Raises and detrimental status effects.
Description:
Easy overview about who is currently resurrecting who,
who is already resurrected,
and who has removable detrimental status effects in the world 
as well as in the group or alliance interface.
Changelog: Updated for Dalamud staging.

Author: Rietty
Name: AutoMammet
Punchline: Provides an easy copy and pastable CSV format you can use for island sanctuary spreadsheets.
Description: Provides an easy copy and pastable CSV format you can use for island sanctuary spreadsheets. Provides options to export the popularity, future popularity and the current cycle's supply and demand shift values. Both as words and as numbers on a scale of -2 to 2. This plugin does not provide any calculations for Island Sanctuary, merely an export option for your ingame data. Information is exported to your clipboard, so you can paste into any other program.
Changelog: Update offsets and code for patch 6.3; Added a scrollbar to save space.

Author: Nadya
Name: Tidy Chat
Punchline: Better game messages and in-depth chat filters to keep a tidy chat.
Description:
It is highly recommended to edit the default settings as you may disagree on which messages should be considered "spam"!

Provides granular filter options to filter nearly all game-related spam, leaving only important game messages in your chat.

  - Filters most spammy game messages
  - Blocks emote spam from other players
  - Condenses earned commendations into a single line
  - Shortens lengthy messages such as joining Novice Network or entering an instanced zone
  - Blocks repeated messages from appearing for a period of time
  - Automatically copies most 'with your chat mode in /say' quest dialogue to your clipboard
  - Write custom filters to Allow/Block messages!
  - And more!
Changelog: Fix Emotes filter

Author: Pilzinsel64, r00telement
Name: Player Tags
Punchline: Lightweight job visibility in nameplates and chat.
Description:
Lightweight job visibility in nameplates and chat. Create custom tags and add them to players with the context menu.

You want to contribute and help developing new features or want to extend existing? Feel free to open Fork and open a Pull Request!

This plugin was originally developed by r00telement but forked and continued by Pilzinsel64.
Changelog:
Version 1.9
- Target to API 8
- Target to .NET 7
- Updated translations

Author: shdwp, Aelexe, maintained by Infi
Name: Fader Plugin
Punchline: Automatically hides UI elements.
Description: Lets you automatically hide certain game UI elements based on number of conditions.

- Fixed a bug (hopefully) in Custom loadout tab where the Import from Clipboard button would not work properly.

Author: akira0245
Name: Reset enmity command
Punchline: Add a reset striking dummy enmity command.
Description: Add a reset striking dummy enmity command.

Author: Haplo064
Name: SlideCast
Description: Adds an indicator of when it's safe to move while casting
Changelog: Tested and working for API 3 and 5.5

Author: Sonar Team
Name: Sonar
Punchline: Automatically send and receive hunt and fate relays.
Description: Automatically send and receive hunt and fate relays. /sonar to open, /sonarconfig to configure. This plugin is closed source and support is only provided in the Sonar Support discord.
Changelog: See the Sonar Support discord #announcements channel for more information

Author: Haplo064
Name: VoidList
Description: Completely removes chosen players from your game.
Changelog:
- New plugin, better blacklist.
- Completely removes players from your game.

Author: Left
Name: ACT Endcounter
Punchline: Ends your encounters with ACT
Description: Pairs with ACT, automatically invokes 'end' at the end of combat. Additional options to invoke 'end' at the start of combat as well. Plus an option to clear your entire encounter when entering a duty.
Changelog:
Simple plugin to be used in conjunction with ACT to automatically echo 'end' at the end of combat to end an encounter. 

Also adds optional reminder to reset encounter data when entering a duty.

Author: Icehunter
Name: AutoTranslateXIV
Punchline: Translates From A to B where A/B are set in config.
Description: Translates Stuff
Changelog: I didn't see the chat translation plugin anymore. This is meant to give a simple autotranslator using either Google or Cognitive Services.

Author: Azure Gem
Name: CharSync
Punchline: Synchronize characters data
Description: Synchronize characters data automatically upon changing zones and logout, and allows to define multiple character groups to synchronize with. This is based upon goat's work, without using native hooks
Changelog:
New Character Data Synchronization plugin without using native hooks.

Be sure to make backups before testing this plugin. While I tested and made sure the basic functionality works, I cannot cover every case and different configurations we may have. Therefore caution is advised.

This work is based from the original CharacterSync by goat.

Author: Haplo064
Name: Chat Translator
Punchline: Enables in-game chat translation.
Description: Automatically translating text in your chat-box, from various languages to one you specify.
Changelog: Fixed certain languages.

Author: iamevn
Name: Doman Mahjong Status
Punchline: log mahjong play stats
Description: Use /mjstat command to log current stats.
Changelog:
Barebones plugin, logs current mahjong play stats with the `/mjstat` chat command. 

This corresponds to https://github.com/iamevn/DomanMahjongStatus/tree/log-v0.1.0

Author: BiscuitUmU, Kazumi
Name: Fantasy Player
Description:
Control Spotify playback from within FFX|V
Use the button below to open settings or use the '/pfp settings' command.
Changelog: No real changes to the code, just an API version bump.

Author: Fr4nsson
Name: Hide Padlock
Punchline: Hides the padlock.
Description:
Allows you to toggle the visibility of the padlock that is next to hotbar one.

Use /padlock to toggle visibility.
Use //padlock to open settings.
Changelog: Fixed padlock settings not loading from config, for real this time.

Author: Talim
Name: MPTimer
Description: Simple MP timer status bar for black mages. Shows the time until your next MP tick, and optionally shows a marker indicating when it is safe to cast Fire III without losing an MP tick.
Changelog:
Updates MPTimer to 1.1.0.
- Adds the ability to customize the bar border, background, fill, and Fire3 threshold colors
- Reorganizes the config window to better accommodate additional settings
- Addresses an issue wherein the bar background rect left a one-pixel gap between the bottom right border and the background.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52226546/129487475-178aef3b-4b3e-40da-ad63-e550b3d672d4.png)

Author: Samuelka
Name: Mount Collectioner
Punchline: Plugin for track collected mounts
Description: A plugin allows you to track received mounts by character.
Changelog:
Mount Collectioner is a plugin for track of collected mounts on a character and methods of obtaining them.
It is possible to choose any character you can find on Lodestone.
![MC Screenshot1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/80639827/154960825-9829c42e-b4ce-466f-a003-0451a8414f5c.png)
![MC Screenshot2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/80639827/154960880-00ec87fc-ef09-4979-b82f-1b3748584b4f.png)

Author: Gotest
Name: Mouse Target Tooltip
Punchline: Shows a tooltip with a little information for characters that the mouse is over.
Description: A plugin that shows a tooltip for mouseover targets.
Changelog: Putting out a small plugin I made. This plugin that shows a tooltip when moused over an entity, such as a player or NPC, and shows a bit of information when available.

Author: darkarchon
Name: Oh gee, CD
Punchline: oGCD helper
Description:
OGCD assistant providing Text To Speech, (Custom) Sound Effects and unlimited extra bars to visualize and alert you for your OGCDs.

This is an early version and things might still break. For any issues please contact darkarchon#4313 on Discord.
Changelog:
This release addresses following:
- VisualizationStyle was not correctly loaded on startup

Author: srkizer
Name: ResetAudio
Punchline: Do not let the game shut up.
Description: Resets game audio device on demand.
Changelog: Make it work for 6.11.

Author: Dragon
Name: Side HUD
Description: Provides fancy side HUD
Changelog: * Fix the font mishap

Author: joshua.software.dev
Name: Size Matters when Fishing
Punchline: For the size evaluation challenged.
Description: Provides labels to tell exactly how large fish are and how quickly they are moving while spearfishing.
Changelog: A simple plugin to aid with recognition of the size and speed of fish while spearfishing.

Author: wozaiha
Name: SkillDisplay
Punchline: Show the skills you used in the past few seconds.
Description: Show the skills you used in the past few seconds.
Changelog: Fix the issue that 'cure' shows incorrect icon.

Author: SupineSnail (Tinuviel)
Name: Job Gauge Adjustments
Punchline: Simple Job Gauges... but you can tweak them now!
Description: Just a simple plugin to allow you to tweak parts of job gauges.
Changelog: Just an update to the new API version. Initial testing seems to indicate there are no breaking changes.

Author: Avaflow
Name: TabTab
Description: Customise the behaviour of tab targeting. Use /ptab to open configuration.
